document.full_text: french open title hopefuls novak djokovic and francesca schiavone made powerful starts to their campaigns with crushing wins in the sunshine at roland garros on monday.
document.title: djokovic and schiavone start fast in french open sun
lines_and_colors: french open title hopefuls novak djokovic and francesca schiavone made powerful starts to their campaigns with crushing wins in the sunshine at roland garros on monday.
